sentences: Junior C# Software Developer – Quant Trading
Quant Capital is urgently looking for a C# Developer to join our high profile client
Our client is a well-known leading provider of integrated risk, analytics and trading solutions for the global financial markets
They specialise in the Quant and Algo Trading Space
Their clients include some of the largest global financial institutions and banks, leading hedge funds, pension funds, insurers, brokers, clearing members and corporates
You will be part a team building cutting-edge applications and services supporting cross-asset trading and risk management
The successful candidate will have a passion for software development and the desire to constantly improve both their skills and the solutions they work on
The ideal developer will have minimum of 6 months professional software development experience
The role is based on new model creation
Platform Development both web and desktop based
Implementation development, which includes data interfaces, workflows and bespoke reports
2:1 or First Class Undergraduate degree in Comp Sci, Maths, Finance, or other technical discipline
Min 1 years professional experience in C# or C++
Some Knowledge of relational databases and SQL
Experience in or serious interest in finance and capital markets
This role suits a junior graduate from a software development background that is looking to take on serious responsibility
We are looking for consultants who want to take ownership of products and take considerable responsibility and the bonus that goes with that
My client is based in Central London
London: reliably commute or plan to relocate before starting work (required)
Work Location: Hybrid remote in London
